name: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Learn to build modern web applications using front-end and back-end technologies.

name: Data Science with Python
description: Master the art of data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python.
main_goal: Analyze and interpret complex data sets.

name: Digital Marketing
description: Learn the essentials of digital marketing, including SEO, social media, and content strategy.
main_goal: Develop and execute effective digital marketing campaigns.

name: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Learn to design, deploy, and manage applications on Amazon Web Services.
main_goal: Gain proficiency in cloud architecture and deployment.

name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Learn the fundamentals of cybersecurity and protect systems from threats.
main_goal: Understand and implement security measures to protect data.

name: Machine Learning with TensorFlow
description: Master machine learning concepts and implement models using TensorFlow.
main_goal: Build and deploy machine learning models.
precautions: Basic understanding of Python and mathematics is recommended.

name: Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification
description: Prepare for the PMP certification exam and gain project management skills.
main_goal: Successfully manage projects and pass the PMP exam.
precautions: Experience in project management is recommended.

name: Graphic Design for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of graphic design, including tools and techniques.
main_goal: Create visually appealing designs for various media.

name: Ethical Hacking
description: Learn ethical hacking techniques to identify and fix security vulnerabilities.
main_goal: Protect systems by identifying and addressing security flaws.

name: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
main_goal: Create high-performance mobile apps for iOS and Android.

name: Financial Modeling with Excel
description: Learn to build financial models and analyze data using Microsoft Excel.
main_goal: Create and interpret complex financial models.
precautions: Basic knowledge of finance is recommended.

name: Blockchain Development
description: Learn to develop decentralized applications on blockchain platforms.
precautions: Familiarity with programming and cryptography is recommended.

name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Explore the fundamentals of AI and its applications in various industries.
main_goal: Understand AI concepts and how to apply them.

name: Photography Masterclass
description: Learn professional photography techniques to capture stunning images.

name: Big Data Analytics
description: Learn to analyze and interpret large data sets using big data tools.
main_goal: Gain insights from big data and make data-driven decisions.
precautions: Basic knowledge of data analysis is recommended.
